Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractObservation
      • Observation
        • Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends Observation
    Version:
    10/28/2018 A class that stores information about the most notable observatoins from the data read in. It is used to store the minimum, maximum, average, and total values. It is also used to turn Strings into GregorianCalendars and ZonedDateTimes and comparing dates to each other.
    Author:
    Grant Campbell

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String DATE_TIME_FORMAT
      An immutable String that contains the format of a date time String

      An int value containing the number of stations reporting valid data

      A StatsType containing the StatsType of a Statistics object
      private java.util.GregorianCalendar utcDateTime
      A GregorianCalendar that contains the date of the data collection
      private java.time.ZonedDateTime zdtDateTime
      A ZonedDateTime that contains the date of the data collection

    • Constructor Detail

      • Statistics

        public Statistics(double value,
                  java.lang.String stid,
                  java.time.ZonedDateTime dateTime,
                  int numberOfValidStations,
                  StatsType inStatType)
        A constructor for the Statistics class that stores data in a Statistics object if the date is passed in as a ZonedDateTime.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of a Statistics object
        stid - The Station ID of a Statistics object
        dateTime - The ZonedDateTime containing the date and time of the data requested.
        numberOfValidStations - The number of stations that reported valid data for that Statistics object
        inStatType - The StatsType that the Statistics object contains

      • Statistics

                  java.lang.String stid,
                  java.util.GregorianCalendar dateTime,
                  int numberOfValidStations,
                  StatsType inStatType)
        A constructor for the Statistics class that stores data in a Statistics object if the date is passed in as a Gregorian Calendar.
        Parameters:
        value - The value of a Statistics object
        stid - The Station ID of a Statistics object
        dateTime - The GregorianCalendar that contains the date and time of data collection.
        numberOfValidStations - The number of stations that reported valid data for that Statistics object
        inStatType - The StatsType that the Statistics object contains
